column3: Latest; A woman in Siem Reap was caught by police after snatching toddler’s golden neck chain.------The incident happened on the morning of Sunday the 6th
column5: in front of Samdech Techo Hun Sen Market in Kroklern
column6: in Siem Riep’s Kork Chork district.------A 41 year old woman named Yua Srey Mao
column7: from Kampong Chhnang.  The woman was busted red handed as she took the necklace. She was swiftly arreste and taken to the police station for further questioning.------Source
